title: The Adventure Zone: Live at Emerald City Comic Con!
description: A holiday party thrown by an old friend takes a turn for the less festive when all the presents and decorations disappear. It’s up to Tres Horny Boys - accompanied by a grumpy companion - to save the day and go on a journey to find the true meaning of Candlenights.
author: shows@themcelroy.family (Travis McElroy, Griffin McElroy, Justin McElroy, Clint McElroy)
